short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch videos without ads using NAIMV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch your favorite videos ad-free with just a click! NAIMV (No Ads In My Videos) is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps you find and watch ad-free versions of your current video from alternative sources.
Key Features

On-demand ad-free viewing - Only activates when you choose, giving you full control
Simple right-click functionality - No complex settings or configurations needed
Works independently - No need for additional ad blockers
Smart source matching - Automatically finds the same content from ad-free platforms
Unobtrusive experience - Seamlessly opens ad-free versions in a new window

How It Works

Find a video you want to watch
Select "Watch with No ads" from the context menu
A new window opens with the same video from an ad-free source

Privacy & Performance
NAIMV respects your privacy and system resources by:

Operating only when explicitly activated by you
Not running in the background
Not collecting any personal data

Perfect for users who want the flexibility to choose when to watch videos ad-free without committing to a full ad-blocking solution. It also doesn't interfere with other adblockers.
Note: The extension is in constant development and a small number of obscure channels will not have an ad-free option.
